content: christmas tree ornament by carolyn calderon the crochet christmas tree ornament is such a fun project and a great way to add some holiday cheer to your home this is a quick pattern to whip up in everyone s favorite corner-to-corner technique and it uses minimal amounts of yarn these would make great gifts a bunting or hanging on your tree too the gauge is 2 5 sts x 4 row = 3 inches in c2c double_crochet i used approximately 25 yards of color a 20 yards of color b and 15 yards of color c made with basic crochet stitches in us terminology see pattern website for more information thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
